tools.name: Normal Pickaxe
tools.description: Increases the amount of resources you get per gather to 3-5 and barely increases the odds of getting an uncommon or better resource.

tools.name: Normal Drill
tools.description: Increases the amount of resources you get per gather to 4-6.

tools.name: Uncommon Pickaxe
tools.description: Increases the amount of resources you get per gather to 5-7 and somewhat increases the odds of getting uncommon or better resource

tools.name: Uncommon Drill
tools.description: Increases the amount of resources you get per gather to 7-9.
